## Definition of Done

- [ ] Code reviewed and approved by at least one peer
- [ ] Unit tests written and passing
- [ ] WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility check passed (no new critical violations)
- [ ] Documentation updated (README, governance docs, or inline comments as appropriate)
- [ ] Tested against .Stat Core NSI demo environment
- [ ] PM sign-off received
